property.name: Code
property.description:
Type: N,
Mode: R
Default = 0. The number identifying the result.

property.name: Text
property.description:
Type: C,
Mode: R
Default = "Success". A description of the result.

property.name: NativeCode
property.description:
Type: N,
Mode: R
Default = 0. The numeric value (if any) returned by the underlying database driver.

property.name: NativeText
property.description:
Type: C,
Mode: R
Default = "". The description (if any) returned by the underlying database driver.

property.name: Syntax
property.description:
Type: C,
Mode: R
Default = "". The syntax type in use when the call was made.

property.name: API
property.description:
Type: C,
Mode: R
Default = "". The API (driver) in use when the call was made.

property.name: RowsAffected
property.description:
Type: N,
Mode: R
Default = 0. The number of rows affected by an insert/update/delete SQL statement.

property.name: Success
property.description:
Type: L,
Mode: R
Default = TRUE (.T.). TRUE (.T.) if the call succeeded; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

property.name: Error
property.description:
Type: L,
Mode: R
Default = FALSE (.F.). TRUE (.T.) if the call failed; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

property.name: Canceled
property.description:
Type: L,
Mode: R
Default = FALSE (.F.). TRUE (.T.) if the call was cancelled; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

property.name: Warnings
property.description:
Type: L,
Mode: R
Default = FALSE (.F.).

property.name: LastInsertedIdentity
property.description:
Mode: R
This property is valid only after an INSERT successfully completes.

page.description: This SQL::CallResult object provides a more complete description of a function call on an object in the SQL name space. Most SQL objects have a member property of type SQL::CallResult. The .Text property contains either "Success" or the last error.
page.example: DIM c as SQL::Connection DIM cs as C cs = "{A5API=Access, FileName=C:\DoesNotExist.Mdb}" ? c.Open(cs) = .F. ? c.CallResult.Text = Database API specific error API Specific Result is: -1 - '[Microsoft][ODBC Microsoft Access Driver] Could not find file '(unknown)'. SQL State is: HY000 [Microsoft][ODBC Driver Manager] Driver's SQLSetConnectAttr failed SQL State is: IM006'
